vocab.mnemonic: A claw (爫) reaching down to grasp a friend (友) close to your heart — that's love.

mnemonicData.story: Every EYE softens when two people confess love.

vocab.mnemonic: Two strokes splitting apart, like breaking something in half — 8 can be split into two equal parts.

mnemonicData.story: The cue BAR brings eight into focus.

vocab.mnemonic: 爸 = 父 (father) + 巴 (to cling to). A child clinging to their father — dad!

mnemonicData.story: The cue token PAPA leads me to dad.

vocab.mnemonic: 杯 = 木 (wood) + 不 (not). A wooden vessel that's 'not' empty — a cup ready to be filled.

mnemonicData.story: The cue token BAY leads me to cup.

vocab.mnemonic: A tree 木 with a line at its root — the root/origin of knowledge is a book.

mnemonicData.story: A quick cue from BUN unlocks measure word for books.

vocab.mnemonic: A bird tries to fly up to the sky but hits a ceiling — not going anywhere!

mnemonicData.story: I decode this as not when BOO appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 艹 (grass/plant) on top + 采 (to pick). Picking plants from the garden — vegetables!

mnemonicData.story: I connect vegetable with the cue SIGH.

vocab.mnemonic: 艹 (plant) + 人 (person) + 木 (tree). A person between plants and trees, picking tea leaves.

mnemonicData.story: The memory path is CHAI to tea.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 乞 (to beg). A mouth begging for food — eating!

mnemonicData.story: I recall to eat when CHEW appears.

vocab.mnemonic: A person 人 stretching their arms out wide — as big as possible!

mnemonicData.story: I remember big through the cue DAY.

vocab.mnemonic: 白 (white) + 勺 (spoon). The white spoon is mine — 'of' or possession.

mnemonicData.story: We land on possessive particle as soon as DUH arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: A fortune teller 占 uses fire 灬 to divine the exact point in time — o'clock.

mnemonicData.story: The memory path is DEAN to o'clock.

vocab.mnemonic: 电 (electricity) + 脑 (brain). An electric brain — a computer!

mnemonicData.story: Computer is what I recall after cue DEAN.

vocab.mnemonic: 电 (electricity) + 视 (to view). Electric viewing — television!

mnemonicData.story: A small DEAN signal locks in television.

vocab.mnemonic: 电 (electricity) + 影 (shadow/image). Electric shadows projected on a screen — movies!

mnemonicData.story: Movie shows up in mind when DEAN does.

vocab.mnemonic: 东 (east) + 西 (west). From east to west, everything in between — stuff/things.

mnemonicData.story: I tie the cue DONG to thing here.

vocab.mnemonic: 者 (one who) lives in the 阝(city). Everyone in the city — all of them.

mnemonicData.story: I keep cue DOE linked with all.

vocab.mnemonic: 讠(words) + 卖 (sell). Selling words to your mind — reading!

mnemonicData.story: I keep cue DO linked with to read.

vocab.mnemonic: 对 (correct) + 不 (not) + 起 (rise). Can't rise to what's correct — I'm sorry.

mnemonicData.story: Seeing DAY, I immediately recall sorry.

vocab.mnemonic: Two 夕 (evening) moons stacked — so many evenings, so many!

mnemonicData.story: This scene reads as many once DOOR lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 多 (many) + 少 (few). How much is it — many or few?

mnemonicData.story: We land on how many as soon as DAY arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: 儿 looks like a little person with legs spread wide, learning to walk — a son. 子 is a child.

mnemonicData.story: When EEL appears, I recall son at once.

vocab.mnemonic: Two horizontal lines — simply the number two.

mnemonicData.story: This entry means two when ARE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 饭 (cooked rice/meal) + 店 (shop). A shop that serves meals — restaurant!

mnemonicData.story: Seeing FOO, I immediately recall restaurant.

vocab.mnemonic: 飞 (to fly) + 机 (machine). A flying machine — airplane!

mnemonicData.story: Airplane becomes natural after cue FOO.

vocab.mnemonic: 分 (to divide) + 钟 (bell/clock). Dividing the clock into parts — minutes.

mnemonicData.story: I read this as minute whenever FOO appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 高 (tall/high) + 兴 (excitement). High excitement — happy!

mnemonicData.story: That GO signal locks in happy quickly.

vocab.mnemonic: A person 人 standing under a cover — just one individual thing.

mnemonicData.story: I treat GEAR as a pointer to general measure word.

vocab.mnemonic: 工 (labor, looks like a beam between floor and ceiling) + 作 (to make). Making with labor — work!

mnemonicData.story: We land on work as soon as GO arrives.

components.meaning: labor, looks like a beam between floor and ceiling

vocab.mnemonic: 犭(animal) + 句 (phrase). The animal that comes when you call its name — a dog!

mnemonicData.story: Dog becomes natural after cue GO.

vocab.mnemonic: 汉 (Han people) + 语 (language). The language of the Han people — Chinese!

mnemonicData.story: At a glance, HOW steers me toward Chinese language.

vocab.mnemonic: 女 (woman) + 子 (child). A mother with her child — that's good!

mnemonicData.story: Good is the target once HOW arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: 好 (good) + 吃 (eat). Good to eat — delicious!

mnemonicData.story: This entry means delicious when HOW appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 曷 (why not). Why not put something in your mouth? Drink up!

mnemonicData.story: To drink is the target once HER arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: 禾 (grain) + 口 (mouth). Grain and mouths together — harmony, togetherness, 'and'.

mnemonicData.story: Seeing HUH, my memory lands on and.

vocab.mnemonic: 彳(step) + 艮 (stubborn/tough). Taking tough steps — going very far!

mnemonicData.story: We land on very as soon as HAN arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: 后 (after/behind) + 面 (face/side). The back face of something — behind.

mnemonicData.story: The cue HOW makes behind feel immediate.

vocab.mnemonic: A small box 口 inside a big box 囗 — going back inside where you came from. Returning!

mnemonicData.story: I hear cue WAY and recall to return.

vocab.mnemonic: 人 (person) + 云 (cloud). A person who can reach the clouds — ability!

mnemonicData.story: I settle on can when cue WAY lands.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like a small table — how many things are on the table?

mnemonicData.story: I settle on how many when cue JEEP lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 宀 (roof) + 豕 (pig). A pig under a roof — in ancient China, keeping pigs meant a prosperous home.

mnemonicData.story: I hold home in mind when JAR appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 丩 (twist). Your mouth twists open to call out someone's name.

mnemonicData.story: The hint JOWL steers me to to be called.

vocab.mnemonic: 今 (now/present) + 天 (day). The present day — today!

mnemonicData.story: I read today from cue token JET.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like an arm flexing — strong enough to lift nine things!

mnemonicData.story: I hear cue JOE and recall nine.

vocab.mnemonic: Two hands 廾 lifting a bar 一 — opening a gate!

mnemonicData.story: I connect to open with the cue KITE.

vocab.mnemonic: 手 (hand) over 目 (eye). Put your hand above your eyes to look into the distance.

mnemonicData.story: To look is easier once cue CAN shows up.

vocab.mnemonic: 看 (look) + 见 (perceive). You look and actually perceive — you see it!

mnemonicData.story: The cue KEY hits and we see.

vocab.mnemonic: 土 (earth) + 夬 (decisive). A decisive chunk of earth — a piece, used for counting money.

mnemonicData.story: A quick cue from WHY unlocks measure word for money.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like a tree 木 with extra branches reaching toward you — come here!

mnemonicData.story: This entry means to come when LIE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 老 (old/experienced) + 师 (master). An experienced master — a teacher!

mnemonicData.story: Teacher is easier once cue LIE shows up.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like a hook — it hooks onto the end of a sentence to mark 'done!'

mnemonicData.story: We land on completed action particle as soon as LUCK arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: 冫(ice) + 令 (command). Ice commands the temperature — cold!

mnemonicData.story: I read this as cold whenever LUNG appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 田 (field) + 土 (earth). The earth within the field — inside.

mnemonicData.story: This entry means inside when LEE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: A roof 亠 with 八 (eight) below but smaller — six is a bit less than eight.

mnemonicData.story: Six comes to mind as LEO shows up.

vocab.mnemonic: 妈 = 女 (woman) + 马 (horse). The woman strong as a horse who carries everything — mom!

mnemonicData.story: The memory path is MAY to mom.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 马 (horse). Your mouth gallops forward like a horse with a question — right?

mnemonicData.story: I pair cue MAMA with the idea question particle.

vocab.mnemonic: The top looks like a fishing net — you cast a net to catch a deal. Buying!

mnemonicData.story: As MY enters, I recall to buy.

vocab.mnemonic: 犭(animal) + 苗 (sprout/seedling). A small animal as delicate as a seedling — a cat!

mnemonicData.story: I keep cue MEOW linked with cat.

vocab.mnemonic: 氵(water) + 殳 (weapon). Your weapon fell in the water — you have not got it anymore!

mnemonicData.story: The cue token MAY leads me to not.

vocab.mnemonic: 没 (not) + 关系 (connection/relation). There's no connection to worry about — it doesn't matter.

mnemonicData.story: The memory path is MAY to it doesn't matter.

vocab.mnemonic: 米 (uncooked rice, looks like grains scattered on a plant) + 饭 (cooked meal). Rice prepared as a meal.

mnemonicData.story: When MAMA appears, I recall rice at once.

components.meaning: uncooked rice, looks like grains scattered on a plant

vocab.mnemonic: 名 = 夕 (evening) + 口 (mouth). In the dark evening, you call out with your mouth — saying your name! 字 = a child 子 under a roof 宀, being given a name.

mnemonicData.story: I catch MAMA and connect it with name.

vocab.mnemonic: 明 = 日 (sun) + 月 (moon). After the sun and moon cycle once more — tomorrow!

mnemonicData.story: The cue MAMA makes me settle on tomorrow.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 那 (that). Mouth asking about 'that' one — which one? Where?

mnemonicData.story: I read this as which whenever NAH appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 阝(place) + 刀 (knife) + 二. Pointing a knife at that place over there — that!

mnemonicData.story: The memory path is NAH to that.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 尼 (nun). A mouth gently asking like a patient nun — and you?

mnemonicData.story: This scene reads as question particle once NUN lands.

vocab.mnemonic: Contains 月 (flesh/body) and claws — a bear's powerful body. With power comes ability!

mnemonicData.story: This scene reads as can once NONE lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 亻(person) + 尔 (you, archaic). A person standing before you — you!

mnemonicData.story: You stays linked to the cue KNEE.

vocab.mnemonic: A person carrying grain on their back after the harvest — one full year of farming complete.

mnemonicData.story: I read year from cue token NEON.

vocab.mnemonic: 女 (woman) + 儿 (child). A woman who is still your child — daughter!

mnemonicData.story: The cue NEW makes daughter feel immediate.

vocab.mnemonic: 朋 = two 月 (moons) side by side — two people close as twin moons. 友 = two hands reaching out together.

mnemonicData.story: The scene points to friend when PAPA flashes.

vocab.mnemonic: 漂 has 氵(water) — beauty that flows like water. 亮 has 高 (high) + 几 — shining high and bright. Beautiful!

mnemonicData.story: This scene reads as pretty once PAPA lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 苹 = 艹 (grass/plant) + 平 (flat/level). 果 = 田 (field) + 木 (tree). The level fruit on a tree — an apple!

mnemonicData.story: That PAPA cue sets off apple immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like a cross with a bent leg — seven cuts across.

mnemonicData.story: Seven shows up in mind when KEY does.

vocab.mnemonic: 前 (front/before) + 面 (face/side). The front face of something — in front of.

mnemonicData.story: The memory of in front of follows the cue CUE.

vocab.mnemonic: 钅(metal/gold) + 戋 (small). Small pieces of metal — coins, money!

mnemonicData.story: Seeing CHAIN, my memory lands on money.

vocab.mnemonic: 讠(speech) + 青 (green/young). Speaking with the freshness of youth — politely saying please.

mnemonicData.story: The cue CHIN makes please feel immediate.

vocab.mnemonic: 土 (earth) + a legs radical. Legs leaving the ground — to go!

mnemonicData.story: The hint CUE steers me to to go.

vocab.mnemonic: 执 (to hold) + 灬 (fire). Holding fire in your hands — hot!

mnemonicData.story: The cue token HER leads me to hot.

vocab.mnemonic: Two strokes leaning on each other like legs — a person walking.

mnemonicData.story: The card clicks as person after RUN.

vocab.mnemonic: 认 = 讠(words) + 人 (person). 识 = 讠(words) + 只 (only). Trading words with a person — getting to know them!

mnemonicData.story: I keep to know a person tied to cue word RUN.

vocab.mnemonic: A rectangle with a line through it — the sun with a sunspot. One cycle of the sun = one day.

mnemonicData.story: The memory path is RIB to day.

vocab.mnemonic: Three horizontal lines — simply three.

mnemonicData.story: A cue from SUN nudges me toward three.

vocab.mnemonic: 商 (commerce/merchant) + 店 (shop). A merchant's shop — a store!

mnemonicData.story: That SHE cue sets off shop immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: A line above a base — something is on top, above.

mnemonicData.story: I tie the cue SONG to above here.

vocab.mnemonic: 上 (upper) + 午 (noon). The upper half before noon — morning!

mnemonicData.story: I tag morning to the sound cue SHE.

vocab.mnemonic: 小 (small) with one stroke removed — even less than small. Few!

mnemonicData.story: This moment becomes few when SHOWER lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 讠(words) + 隹 (short-tailed bird). Who is that bird you're talking about? Who?

mnemonicData.story: The clue lands as SHEA, then who follows.

vocab.mnemonic: 什 = 亻(person) + 十 (ten). 么 = tiny/small. A person with ten small questions — what?

mnemonicData.story: What shows up in mind when SHE does.

vocab.mnemonic: A cross + shape — two hands with all ten fingers spread.

mnemonicData.story: The anchor SHE helps me recall ten.

vocab.mnemonic: 时 = 日 (sun) + 寸 (inch). 候 = 亻(person) + waiting. Measuring the sun inch by inch — waiting for the right time.

mnemonicData.story: As soon as SHE appears, I recall time.

vocab.mnemonic: 日 (sun) + 正 (correct/straight). Straight under the sun, clear as day — it is!

mnemonicData.story: To be becomes natural after cue SHE.

vocab.mnemonic: A hand holding a brush, writing — the product of writing is a book.

mnemonicData.story: I map SHOE directly to book.

vocab.mnemonic: A central stream with splashes on each side — flowing water.

mnemonicData.story: I map SWAY directly to water.

vocab.mnemonic: 水 (water) + 果 (fruit). Juicy, water-filled fruit!

mnemonicData.story: The SHE hint arrives, and I think fruit.

vocab.mnemonic: 睡 = 目 (eye) + 垂 (droop). 觉 = to feel. Your eyes are drooping — time to sleep!

mnemonicData.story: With SHE in front, we sleep now.

vocab.mnemonic: 讠(words) + 兑 (exchange). Exchanging words — speaking!

mnemonicData.story: This card signals to speak once SHORE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: A mouth 口 with four-ish lines inside — the number four boxed up.

mnemonicData.story: I pair cue SEE with the idea four.

vocab.mnemonic: 山 (mountain) + 夕 (evening). Counting the evenings over the mountains — counting years of age.

mnemonicData.story: The cue SWAY turns this card into years old.

vocab.mnemonic: 亻(person) + 也 (also). That other person also — he/him.

mnemonicData.story: I pair cue TAR with the idea he.

vocab.mnemonic: 女 (woman) + 也 (also). That woman also — she/her.

mnemonicData.story: She is easier once cue TAR shows up.

vocab.mnemonic: 大 (big) with an extra dot — even bigger than big. Too much!

mnemonicData.story: I decode this as too when TIE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 天 (sky/heaven) + 气 (air/vapor). The air in the sky — weather!

mnemonicData.story: A clear TIE cue pulls up weather right away.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 斤 (axe/weight). Words that carry weight reaching your ear — listen!

mnemonicData.story: The card clicks as to listen after TINGE.

vocab.mnemonic: 同 (same) + 学 (study). People who study the same things — classmates!

mnemonicData.story: I remember classmate through the cue TIE.

vocab.mnemonic: 口 (mouth) + 畏 (fear/awe). You open your mouth cautiously when answering the phone — hello?

mnemonicData.story: Hello on phone comes faster when cue WAY appears.

vocab.mnemonic: A hand 手 holding a weapon 戈 — I will defend myself! Me!

mnemonicData.story: The cue WORE turns this card into I.

vocab.mnemonic: 我 (I) + 们 (plural people marker, with 亻person + 门 door). All of us people at the door — we!

mnemonicData.story: The clue lands as WORE, then we follows.

components.meaning: plural people marker, with 亻person + 门 door

vocab.mnemonic: Lines crossing between top and bottom — the five elements bridging heaven and earth.

mnemonicData.story: I attach five to the marker WOO.

vocab.mnemonic: 喜 = 士 (scholar) + 口 (mouth) + 豆 (bean). A scholar happily eating beans! 欢 = joy. Happy and joyful — to like!

mnemonicData.story: A small SHEER signal locks in to like.

vocab.mnemonic: A line with a stroke hanging below it — something is underneath. Below!

mnemonicData.story: I map SHEA directly to below.

vocab.mnemonic: 下 (lower) + 午 (noon). The lower half after noon — afternoon!

mnemonicData.story: A clear SHEER cue pulls up afternoon right away.

vocab.mnemonic: 先 (first/before) + 生 (born/life). One who was born before you — an elder, Mr./Sir.

mnemonicData.story: Mr. comes faster when cue SHEER appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 现 (appear/present) + 在 (at/exist). Appearing and existing — right now!

mnemonicData.story: The SHEER hint arrives, and I think now.

vocab.mnemonic: 相 (mutual/appearance) + 心 (heart). Your heart examines appearances — thinking and wanting.

mnemonicData.story: The clue lands as SIGH, then to want follows.

vocab.mnemonic: A vertical line with two small dots — something being divided into tiny pieces. Small!

mnemonicData.story: This card signals small once SHOW appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 小 (small/young) + 姐 (older sister, 女 woman + 且 moreover). A young woman — Miss!

mnemonicData.story: I map SHEER directly to Miss.

components.meaning: older sister, 女 woman + 且 moreover

vocab.mnemonic: 此 (this) + 二 (two). This and that, a couple of things — some.

mnemonicData.story: The cue SHEER keeps some easy to recall.

vocab.mnemonic: 冖 (cover/roof) + 与 (give). Under a roof, giving form to words — writing!

mnemonicData.story: The sound cue SHEER points toward to write.

vocab.mnemonic: 谢 = 讠(words) + 射 (shoot). Words that shoot from the heart — thank you!

mnemonicData.story: Thank you becomes obvious once SHEER appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 星 = 日 (sun) + 生 (born). 期 = a period of time. A period marked by the birth of new suns — a week of days!

mnemonicData.story: Week stays linked to the cue SHEER.

vocab.mnemonic: 学 (to study) + 生 (born/life). A life devoted to study — a student!

mnemonicData.story: I tag student to the sound cue SHEER.

vocab.mnemonic: 学 = a child 子 under a roof with hands guiding. 习 = feathers 羽 practicing flight. Learning to fly — studying!

mnemonicData.story: Once SHEER shows up, we study immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: 学 (study) + 校 (compare/school, 木 wood + 交 cross). Where students cross paths to study — school!

mnemonicData.story: A quick SHEER cue brings up school.

components.meaning: compare/school, 木 wood + 交 cross

vocab.mnemonic: A single horizontal stroke — the simplest number, one.

mnemonicData.story: The clue lands as EEL, then one follows.

vocab.mnemonic: 衣 looks like a robe with flowing sleeves. 服 = 月 (body) + 又 (hand) serving. What your body wears — clothes!

mnemonicData.story: I keep cue YOU linked with clothes.

vocab.mnemonic: 医 = 匸 (box) + 矢 (arrow). Removing arrows from wounds! 生 (life). One who saves lives — doctor!

mnemonicData.story: Doctor comes to mind as YOU shows up.

vocab.mnemonic: 医 (medicine/heal) + 院 (courtyard/institution). A medical institution — hospital!

mnemonicData.story: As soon as YOU appears, I recall hospital.

vocab.mnemonic: 椅 = 木 (wood) + 奇 (strange/wonderful). A wonderful wooden invention to sit on — a chair!

mnemonicData.story: This entry means chair when YOU appears.

vocab.mnemonic: A hand (ナ) grabbing the moon (月) — reaching out and having something!

mnemonicData.story: This scene reads as to have once YO lands.

vocab.mnemonic: A crescent shape — the moon! One cycle of the moon = one month.

mnemonicData.story: The memory of month follows the cue YOU.

vocab.mnemonic: 土 (earth) + a presence marker. Being present on this earth — to be at a place.

mnemonicData.story: At becomes obvious once SIGH appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 再 (again) + 见 (see). See you again — goodbye!

mnemonicData.story: This entry means goodbye when ZEST appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 怎 = 乍 (suddenly) + 心 (heart). 么 = what. Your heart suddenly wonders — how?

mnemonicData.story: The memory path is ZOO to how.

vocab.mnemonic: 怎么 (how) + 样 (manner/appearance). How is the manner of things — how about it?

mnemonicData.story: I decode this as how about when ZOO appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 辶 (walking) + 文 (text/pattern). Walking toward this particular thing — this!

mnemonicData.story: This becomes obvious once JET appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 中 (middle) + 午 (the noon hour). The middle of the day — noon!

mnemonicData.story: Noon comes faster when cue ZOO appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 亻(person) + 主 (master/owner). A person who is master of their place — they live there!

mnemonicData.story: I read to live from cue token ZOO.

vocab.mnemonic: 桌 = 卜 + 日 on top of 木 (wood). A flat wooden surface lit by the sun — a table!

mnemonicData.story: The sound cue ZOO points toward table.

vocab.mnemonic: 宀 (roof) + 子 (child). A child born under a roof — a written character is born!

mnemonicData.story: The memory of character follows the cue ZEE.

vocab.mnemonic: 昨 = 日 (sun/day) + 乍 (suddenly/just now). 天 (day). The day that just passed — yesterday!

mnemonicData.story: I attach yesterday to the marker ZOO.

vocab.mnemonic: Two people 人人 on the earth 土 — sitting on the ground together.

mnemonicData.story: The anchor ZOO helps me recall to sit.

vocab.mnemonic: 亻(person) + 故 (reason/cause). A person with a reason — someone doing something!

mnemonicData.story: I tag to do to the sound cue ZOO.

vocab.mnemonic: 另 (other) + 刂 (knife). A knife cutting you off — don't do that!

mnemonicData.story: The BOO hint arrives, and I think don't.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like long flowing hair — stretching out long!

mnemonicData.story: The cue CHAIN keeps long easy to recall.

vocab.mnemonic: A sprout 屮 pushing up through the ground — coming out!

mnemonicData.story: We land on to go out as soon as CHEW arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: 穴 (cave/hole) + 牙 (tooth). Threading teeth through a hole — like putting on clothes, threading your body through!

mnemonicData.story: The cue word CHURN calls up to wear.

vocab.mnemonic: 冫(ice) + 欠 (owe/lack). Each time the ice melts, you count another occurrence.

mnemonicData.story: The cue CHAIN makes me settle on time.

vocab.mnemonic: Two people 人人 one behind the other — following from one place to another.

mnemonicData.story: A quick SONG cue brings up from.

vocab.mnemonic: 钅(metal/gold) + 昔 (past). The gold from the past turned out to be fake — wrong!

mnemonicData.story: I catch CHAIN and connect it with wrong.

vocab.mnemonic: 打 (hit/strike) + 电话 (electric speech). Striking up an electric conversation — making a call!

mnemonicData.story: To make a phone call is the target once DAY arrives.

vocab.mnemonic: 打 (hit/strike) + 篮球 (basket ball). Hitting the basket ball — playing basketball!

mnemonicData.story: The clue lands as DAY, then to play basketball follows.

vocab.mnemonic: 大 (big) + 家 (family). One big family — everyone!

mnemonicData.story: The cue token DAY leads me to everyone.

vocab.mnemonic: 至 (reach) + 刂 (knife). Cutting through to reach your destination — arrive!

mnemonicData.story: I connect to arrive with the cue DAY.

vocab.mnemonic: 彳(step) + 日 (sun) + 寸 (inch). Steps measured by the sun, inch by inch — how well you do something.

mnemonicData.story: A quick DUH cue brings up complement particle.

vocab.mnemonic: 竹 (bamboo) + 寺 (temple). Waiting at a bamboo temple — patiently waiting.

mnemonicData.story: The sound cue DONG points toward to wait.

vocab.mnemonic: 弟 has 弓 (bow) + a small figure. The younger one still learning to use the bow — little brother!

mnemonicData.story: A quick DAY cue makes me picture younger brother.

vocab.mnemonic: 第 (ordinal prefix) + 一 (one). The number one position — first!

mnemonicData.story: I treat DAY as a pointer to first.

vocab.mnemonic: 忄(heart) + 董 (to direct). Your heart directs you to comprehend — to understand!

mnemonicData.story: The cue word DAY calls up to understand.

vocab.mnemonic: 又 (hand) + 寸 (inch). Your hand measures exactly one inch — correct!

mnemonicData.story: A cue from DAY nudges me toward correct.

vocab.mnemonic: 房 = 户 (door) + 方 (square). 间 = 门 (gate) + 日 (sun). A square space behind a door where sunlight enters — a room!

mnemonicData.story: I tag room to the sound cue FOO.

vocab.mnemonic: 非 (not) + 常 (ordinary). Not ordinary at all — extremely!

mnemonicData.story: Very is easier once cue FOO shows up.

vocab.mnemonic: 服务 (to serve) + 员 (person/member). A person who serves — waiter!

mnemonicData.story: The scene points to waiter when FOO flashes.

vocab.mnemonic: 公共 (public) + 汽车 (automobile). A public automobile — a bus!

mnemonicData.story: The cue GO makes bus feel immediate.

vocab.mnemonic: 公 (public/official) + 司 (manage). Officially managing business — a company!

mnemonicData.story: As soon as GO appears, I recall company.

vocab.mnemonic: 中 (middle) + 一 + 贝 (shell/money). A pile of shells (ancient money) — expensive!

mnemonicData.story: A quick cue from GO unlocks expensive.

vocab.mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 寸 (inch). Walking inch by inch through time — something that has passed.

mnemonicData.story: Past tense particle is what I recall after cue GO.

vocab.mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 不 (not). Still walking, not stopping — still going, also continuing!

mnemonicData.story: I keep still tied to cue word HIGH.

vocab.mnemonic: 还 (still) + 是 (is). Is it still this or that — or?

mnemonicData.story: At a glance, HOW steers me toward or.

vocab.mnemonic: 孩 = 子 (child) + 亥 (last). 子 (child). The little one at the end of the family line — a child!

mnemonicData.story: That HOW signal locks in child quickly.

vocab.mnemonic: A window 囗 covered with soot 灬 — everything is dark and black!

mnemonicData.story: I hold black in mind when HOW appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 纟(silk) + 工 (work). The silk workers dye fabric — red silk!

mnemonicData.story: The cue HOW turns this card into red.

vocab.mnemonic: 艹 (plant) + 化 (transform). A plant that transforms into something beautiful — a flower!

mnemonicData.story: The cue HOW brings flower into focus.

vocab.mnemonic: 欢 (joy) + 迎 (to greet). Greeting with joy — welcome!

mnemonicData.story: A cue from HOW nudges me toward to welcome.

vocab.mnemonic: 火车 (fire vehicle = train) + 站 (stand/station). Where the fire vehicle stops — train station!

mnemonicData.story: The clue lands as HOW, then train station follows.

vocab.mnemonic: 机 (machine/airplane) + 场 (field/ground). The field where airplanes land — airport!

mnemonicData.story: I recall airport when JAR appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 鸡 (chicken) + 蛋 (egg). What the chicken produces — an egg!

mnemonicData.story: That JAR cue sets off egg immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: 亻(person) + 牛 (cow). A person counts their cows one piece at a time — a measure word for items.

mnemonicData.story: I treat JAR as a pointer to measure word for matters/clothes.

vocab.mnemonic: 教 (teach) + 室 (room). A room for teaching — classroom!

mnemonicData.story: This scene reads as classroom once JAR lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 姐 = 女 (woman) + 且 (moreover/also). The woman who is moreover older than you — big sister!

mnemonicData.story: Older sister shows up in mind when JAR does.

vocab.mnemonic: 介 = 人 (person) between two lines. 绍 = 纟(silk) + 召 (summon). A person weaving connections, summoning others — introducing!

mnemonicData.story: The JET signal arrives; we introduce at once.

vocab.mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 斤 (axe/short). A short walk — near!

mnemonicData.story: A brief JAR flash points me to near.

vocab.mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 井 (well). Walking into the well area — entering!

mnemonicData.story: The sound cue JET points toward to enter.

vocab.mnemonic: 京 (capital) + 尤 (especially). Especially in the capital, things happen at once — then, immediately!

mnemonicData.story: A clear JAR cue pulls up then right away.

vocab.mnemonic: 觉 = 学 (study) + 见 (see). 得 = to obtain. Studying what you see and obtaining a feeling — to feel/think!

mnemonicData.story: The cue JAR turns this card into to feel.

vocab.mnemonic: Both characters have 口 (mouth) — a drink for the mouth. 加 (add) + 非 (not ordinary). Not your ordinary drink — coffee!

mnemonicData.story: A quick KEY cue makes me picture coffee.

vocab.mnemonic: 开 (open) + 始 (begin, 女 woman + 台 platform). Opening the platform — starting!

mnemonicData.story: The cue word KEY calls up to begin.

components.meaning: begin, 女 woman + 台 platform

vocab.mnemonic: 考 = 老 (old) with a twist — the elders test you. 试 = 讠(words) + 式 (style). Words in a formal style — an exam!

mnemonicData.story: A quick cue from KEY unlocks exam.

vocab.mnemonic: 可 (can) + 能 (able). If you can and are able — it's possible!

mnemonicData.story: The cue KEY keeps maybe easy to recall.

vocab.mnemonic: 可 (can/approve) + 以 (use/by). Approved for use — you may!

mnemonicData.story: This moment becomes may when KEY lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 讠(words) + 果 (fruit). Words bearing fruit — a lesson!

mnemonicData.story: When KEY appears, I recall class at once.

vocab.mnemonic: 忄(heart) + 夬 (decisive). A heart that decides quickly — fast!

mnemonicData.story: A clear KEY cue pulls up fast right away.

vocab.mnemonic: 快 (quick) + 乐 (joy/music). Quick to feel joy — happy!

mnemonicData.story: I use KEY to reach meaning happy.

vocab.mnemonic: A complex character showing separation — away from!

mnemonicData.story: I hold away from in mind when LEE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 一 (one) with two 人 (people) inside — a pair, two of something.

mnemonicData.story: This moment becomes two when LIE lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 足 (foot) + 各 (each). Each foot takes a step on the path — road!

mnemonicData.story: The cue word LOO calls up road.

vocab.mnemonic: 旅 (journey) + 游 (swim/roam). Journeying and roaming — traveling!

mnemonicData.story: The anchor LIE helps me recall to travel.

vocab.mnemonic: Like 买 (buy) but with 十 (ten) on top — selling ten things at once!

mnemonicData.story: I keep cue MY linked with to sell.

vocab.mnemonic: 忄(heart) + 曼 (extended/prolonged). A heart that is prolonged and extended — slow!

mnemonicData.story: Slow shows up in mind when MAMA does.

vocab.mnemonic: 忄(heart) + 亡 (die/perish). Your heart is dying from being so busy!

mnemonicData.story: Seeing MAMA, I immediately recall busy.

vocab.mnemonic: A mother 母 with a stroke — every mother cares for each child.

mnemonicData.story: The cue word MAMA calls up every.

vocab.mnemonic: 妹 = 女 (woman) + 未 (not yet). The woman not yet grown up — little sister!

mnemonicData.story: I catch MAMA and connect it with younger sister.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like a traditional Chinese double door — a gate!

mnemonicData.story: The answer door arrives with cue MAMA.

vocab.mnemonic: 田 (field) + 力 (strength). Strength in the field — traditionally male!

mnemonicData.story: The cue token NEW leads me to male.

vocab.mnemonic: 你 (you) + 心 (heart). You, with heart — the respectful, polite 'you'!

mnemonicData.story: A quick NEW cue makes me picture you.

vocab.mnemonic: 牛 (cow) + 奶 (milk/breast, 女 woman + 乃). What comes from the cow — milk!

mnemonicData.story: Seeing NEW, my memory lands on milk.

vocab.mnemonic: A figure kneeling gracefully — the character for woman.

mnemonicData.story: Female comes faster when cue NEW appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 旁 (side) + 边 (edge). At the side edge — beside!

mnemonicData.story: When PAPA appears, I recall beside at once.

vocab.mnemonic: 跑 = 足 (foot) + 包 (wrap). 步 = 止 (stop) + 少 (few). Feet wrapping the ground with few stops — running!

mnemonicData.story: Once PAPA shows up, we run immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: 便 = 亻(person) + 更 (more). 宜 (suitable). More suitable for a person's wallet — cheap!

mnemonicData.story: That PAPA signal locks in cheap quickly.

vocab.mnemonic: 西 (west) + 示 (show). Show this to go west — a ticket!

mnemonicData.story: Ticket is what I recall after cue PAPA.

vocab.mnemonic: 妻 = a woman 女 with a hand holding a broom. 子 (child). The woman of the house — wife!

mnemonicData.story: This moment becomes wife when CUE lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 起 (rise) + 床 (bed, 广 shelter + 木 wood). Rising from the wooden bed — getting up!

mnemonicData.story: When CUE appears, we get up without delay.

components.meaning: bed, 广 shelter + 木 wood

vocab.mnemonic: 十 (ten) with an extra stroke — ten times a hundred makes a thousand!

mnemonicData.story: That CUE signal locks in thousand quickly.

vocab.mnemonic: 铅 (lead, 钅metal + 几) + 笔 (brush/pen, 竹 bamboo + 毛 hair). A lead-tipped bamboo writing tool — pencil!

mnemonicData.story: I pair cue CUE with the idea pencil.

components.meaning: brush/pen, 竹 bamboo + 毛 hair

vocab.mnemonic: 日 (sun) + 青 (green/blue). The sun shining on a blue-green sky — clear weather!

mnemonicData.story: I settle on clear weather when cue CUE lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 讠(words) + 上 (up). Words that lift restrictions — to let, to allow!

mnemonicData.story: At RUNG, we let without delay.

vocab.mnemonic: 日 (day) + 记 (record). A daily record — a diary!

mnemonicData.story: Seeing RUN, my memory lands on diary.

vocab.mnemonic: 上 (go up/to) + 班 (shift/class). Going to your shift — going to work!

mnemonicData.story: When SHE appears, we go work without delay.

vocab.mnemonic: 身 (body, looks like a person with a big belly) + 体 = 亻(person) + 本 (root). A person's root — their body/health!

mnemonicData.story: I tag body to the sound cue SHE.

components.meaning: body, looks like a person with a big belly

vocab.mnemonic: 生 (born/arise) + 病 (illness, 疒 sickness + 丙). Illness arises — getting sick!

mnemonicData.story: As SHE enters, I recall to get sick.

vocab.mnemonic: 生 (born/birth) + 日 (day). The day you were born — birthday!

mnemonicData.story: Birthday shows up in mind when SHE does.

vocab.mnemonic: 手 (hand) + 表 (surface/display). A display on your hand — wristwatch!

mnemonicData.story: As soon as SHE appears, I recall wristwatch.

vocab.mnemonic: 手 (hand) + 机 (machine). A machine in your hand — cell phone!

mnemonicData.story: At a glance, SHE steers me toward cell phone.

vocab.mnemonic: 疒 (illness) + 叟 (old man). An old man weakened by illness — thin!

mnemonicData.story: With SHOW in view, thin comes up fast.

vocab.mnemonic: 说 (speak) + 话 (words/speech). Speaking words — talking!

mnemonicData.story: I map SHE directly to to speak.

vocab.mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 关 (close/care). Walking to someone you care about — to give or send!

mnemonicData.story: This entry means to give a gift when SHE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 虽 = 虫 (insect) + 口 (mouth). 然 = 然 (so/correct). Even though an insect speaks — although!

mnemonicData.story: I reach although right after hearing SHE.

vocab.mnemonic: 宀 (roof) + 匕 (spoon). Something under a roof, but not a person — it!

mnemonicData.story: It shows up in mind when TAR does.

vocab.mnemonic: 踢 = 足 (foot) + 易 (easy). 足球 = foot ball. Kicking a ball with your foot — soccer!

mnemonicData.story: This moment becomes to play soccer when TIE lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 是 (is) + 页 (page). What is on the page — a question/topic!

mnemonicData.story: I settle on question when cue TIE lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 跳 = 足 (foot) + 兆 (omen). 舞 = dancing figure. Feet moving like an omen of joy — dancing!

mnemonicData.story: When TIE appears, we dance without delay.

vocab.mnemonic: 夕 (evening) + 卜 (divination). Divining under the evening sky, outside the walls — outside!

mnemonicData.story: A quick cue from WHY unlocks outside.

vocab.mnemonic: 宀 (roof) + 元 (origin/first). Under the roof from start to finish — complete!

mnemonicData.story: The WORE signal arrives; we finish at once.

vocab.mnemonic: 王 (king) + 元 (origin). Even kings need to return to their origins and play!

mnemonicData.story: I decode this as to play when WORE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 晚 = 日 (sun) + 免 (exempt). The sun is exempt from shining — evening! 上 (on/during).

mnemonicData.story: One look at WORE, and I remember evening.

vocab.mnemonic: 彳(step) + 主 (master). Stepping toward the master — heading in a direction!

mnemonicData.story: A quick WORE cue brings up toward.

vocab.mnemonic: 为 (for/because) + 什么 (what). For what reason — why?

mnemonicData.story: A brief WORE flash points me to why.

vocab.mnemonic: 门 (door) + 口 (mouth). A mouth at the door — asking to come in!

mnemonicData.story: Seeing WORE, we quickly ask.

vocab.mnemonic: 问 (ask) + 题 (topic). Asking about a topic — a question or problem!

mnemonicData.story: I connect question with the cue WORE.

vocab.mnemonic: 氵(water) + 先 (first). Water first — the first step is to wash!

mnemonicData.story: After SHEER, the action is to wash.

vocab.mnemonic: 西 (west) + 瓜 (melon). The melon from the west — watermelon!

mnemonicData.story: That SHEER signal locks in watermelon quickly.

vocab.mnemonic: 希 (rare/scarce) + 望 (gaze/expect). Gazing at something rare — hoping!

mnemonicData.story: The cue SHEER turns this card into to hope.

vocab.mnemonic: 小 (small) + 时 (time). A small unit of time — an hour!

mnemonicData.story: As soon as SHEER appears, I recall hour.

vocab.mnemonic: 竹 (bamboo) + 夭 (young/tender). Young bamboo bending in the wind — like a smiling face!

mnemonicData.story: The sound cue SHEER points toward to laugh.

vocab.mnemonic: 亲 (close/parent) + 斤 (axe). Cutting fresh wood with an axe — new!

mnemonicData.story: With SHEER in view, new comes up fast.

vocab.mnemonic: 女 (woman) + 生 (born). The name a woman is born with — surname!

mnemonicData.story: The sound cue SHEER points toward surname.

vocab.mnemonic: 休 = 亻(person) + 木 (tree). A person leaning against a tree — resting! 息 = 自 (self) + 心 (heart). Your heart calms itself.

mnemonicData.story: The answer to rest arrives with cue SHEER.

vocab.mnemonic: 雨 (rain) + 彐 (hand). Rain that you can hold in your hand — snow!

mnemonicData.story: That SHEER cue sets off snow immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: 颜 = 彦 (elegant) + 页 (page/face). 色 (color). The elegant colors on a face — color!

mnemonicData.story: The cue YOU makes color feel immediate.

vocab.mnemonic: 眼 = 目 (eye) + 艮 (stubborn/steady). 睛 = 目 (eye) + 青 (green/clear). A steady, clear eye — eyes!

mnemonicData.story: I tag eye to the sound cue YOU.

vocab.mnemonic: 艹 (plant/herb) + 约 (agreement). Plants that have an agreement with your body to heal — medicine!

mnemonicData.story: At a glance, YOW steers me toward medicine.

vocab.mnemonic: 西 (west) + 女 (woman). A woman looking west, wanting something — to want!

mnemonicData.story: I use YOW to reach meaning to want.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like a snake or river branching — this way and also that way!

mnemonicData.story: A quick YEAH cue makes me picture also.

vocab.mnemonic: 已 (already/stop) + 经 (pass through). Having already passed through — already!

mnemonicData.story: I catch YOU and connect it with already.

vocab.mnemonic: 一 (one) + 起 (rise). Rising as one — together!

mnemonicData.story: A small YOU signal locks in together.

vocab.mnemonic: 一 (one) + 下 (down). One quick downward motion — just a bit!

mnemonicData.story: When YOU appears, I recall bit at once.

vocab.mnemonic: 因 = 囗 (enclosure) + 大 (big). 为 (for). A big reason enclosed — because!

mnemonicData.story: This moment becomes because when YOU lands.

vocab.mnemonic: 阝(hill/mound) + 月 (moon). The moon behind a hill — shadowy, cloudy!

mnemonicData.story: The YOU hint arrives, and I think cloudy.

vocab.mnemonic: 游 = 氵(water) + 方 (direction) + 子 (child). 泳 = 氵(water) + 永 (eternal). A child finding their way through water forever — swimming!

mnemonicData.story: When YOU appears, we swim without delay.

vocab.mnemonic: 右 = a hand (ナ) + 口 (mouth). Your right hand near your mouth. 边 (side). The right side!

mnemonicData.story: That YOU signal locks in right side quickly.

vocab.mnemonic: Looks like a fish with a head, body, and tail fin — fish!

mnemonicData.story: I use YOU to reach meaning fish.

vocab.mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 元 (origin). Walking far from your origin — far!

mnemonicData.story: That YOU cue sets off far immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: 运 = 辶 (walk) + 云 (cloud). 动 = 云 (cloud) + 力 (strength). Moving with the strength of clouds — exercise!

mnemonicData.story: A cue from YOU nudges me toward sports.

vocab.mnemonic: 早 = 日 (sun) + 十 (ten). The sun at ten o'clock height. 上 (on). Early in the day — morning!

mnemonicData.story: At a glance, ZOO steers me toward morning.

vocab.mnemonic: 丈 (ten feet tall) + 夫 (man). A man who stands ten feet tall — husband!

mnemonicData.story: A small ZOO signal locks in husband.

vocab.mnemonic: 扌(hand) + 戈 (weapon). A hand searching for a weapon — looking for something!

mnemonicData.story: The sound cue ZOO points toward to look for.

vocab.mnemonic: 羊 (sheep) + 目 (eye). Keeping an eye on the sheep — an ongoing, continuous action!

mnemonicData.story: I read this as ongoing action particle whenever ZOO appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 十 (ten) + 具 (tool). Ten genuine tools — really, truly authentic!

mnemonicData.story: That ZOO cue sets off really immediately.

vocab.mnemonic: 正 (straight/correct) + 在 (at). Right at this moment, in the correct place — right now doing something!

mnemonicData.story: A clear ZOO cue pulls up process right away.

vocab.mnemonic: 知 = 矢 (arrow) + 口 (mouth). 道 = way/path. An arrow from your mouth hits the right path — you know!

mnemonicData.story: I use ZOO to reach meaning to know.

vocab.mnemonic: 准 = 冫(ice) + 隹 (bird). 备 = 夂 (go) + 田 (field). A bird on ice getting ready to fly to the fields — preparing!

mnemonicData.story: I connect to prepare with the cue ZOO.

vocab.mnemonic: 自 (self) + 行 (go/travel) + 车 (vehicle). A self-propelled vehicle — bicycle!

mnemonicData.story: That ZOO signal locks in bicycle quickly.

vocab.mnemonic: 土 (earth) + a running figure on top. A person running on the earth — walking/going!

mnemonicData.story: To walk becomes obvious once ZOE appears.

vocab.mnemonic: 日 (sun) + 取 (take). Taking the sun — reaching the most, the highest!

mnemonicData.story: A small ZOO signal locks in most.

vocab.mnemonic: 左 = a hand (ナ) + 工 (work). The hand that works. 边 (side). The left side!

mnemonicData.story: I get to left side from the cue ZOO.

radicals.mnemonic: An open mouth shape, like a square speaking.

radicals.mnemonic: Two legs walking together form a person.

radicals.mnemonic: A kneeling figure traditionally used for woman.

mnemonicData.story: NEW custom portrays a graceful lady bowing with calm respect.

radicals.mnemonic: A child with outstretched arms learning to walk.

radicals.mnemonic: Looks like fingers and palm reaching out.

radicals.mnemonic: The shape suggests chambers and emotion inside.

mnemonicData.story: SIGH, resolve steadies when danger closes in.

radicals.mnemonic: A central stream with side splashes: flowing water.

mnemonicData.story: SWAY currents split from one source through the valley.

radicals.mnemonic: Flames rising from a central spark.

mnemonicData.story: WORE sparks leap to dry branches at midnight.

mnemonicData.story: RIB clocks strike at dawn as market stalls open.

radicals.mnemonic: A crescent-like form for moon and flesh.

radicals.mnemonic: Words stacked above a mouth line.

mnemonicData.story: YEN herald voice announces words across the square.

radicals.mnemonic: A lid above food being eaten.

mnemonicData.story: SHE steam rises as bowls arrive from the kitchen.

radicals.mnemonic: A doorway seen from the front.

mnemonicData.story: MAN guards swing the city entrance wide for newcomers.

radicals.mnemonic: A path mark showing motion forward.

mnemonicData.story: CHAIR wheels roll as the traveler follows the route.

radicals.mnemonic: Sprouting strokes on top of plant words.

mnemonicData.story: COW bells ring over fresh herbs on the hillside.

radicals.mnemonic: Compressed speech radical on the left side.

mnemonicData.story: YEN whispers slip through the doorway before dawn.

radicals.mnemonic: Three drops of water on the left.

mnemonicData.story: SWAY stream runs along dark stone into a basin.

radicals.mnemonic: Hand radical squeezed to fit the left side.

mnemonicData.story: SHOW grip tightens as fingers yank the rope hard.

radicals.mnemonic: Heart radical in narrow side form.

mnemonicData.story: SIGH pulse quickens when footsteps near the gate.

radicals.mnemonic: Narrow person radical standing on the left.

mnemonicData.story: RUN figure leans forward mid-step on the road.

radicals.mnemonic: A sheltering roof over what is below.

mnemonicData.story: MEAN weather tests the shelter set above the household.

radicals.mnemonic: A mound of ground crossing a base line.

mnemonicData.story: TOO much rain packs the ground firm by the wall.

radicals.mnemonic: Metal pieces gathered under a roof-like top.

mnemonicData.story: As forging begins, coins cool on the bench.

radicals.mnemonic: Compressed metal radical used in compounds.

mnemonicData.story: After forging, one hammer rings on the anvil.

radicals.mnemonic: Drops falling from a sky frame.

mnemonicData.story: YOU hear clouds burst and alleys turn slick.

radicals.mnemonic: An eye shape with pupil-like center.

mnemonicData.story: MOO gaze locks onto a distant moving target.

radicals.mnemonic: A foot stepping forward from the ground.

mnemonicData.story: ZOO sprinter launches from the track in one stride.

radicals.mnemonic: Slope/place marker at the side of characters.

mnemonicData.story: A foothill path bends around a steep embankment.

radicals.mnemonic: A stalk of grain with bending leaves.

mnemonicData.story: HUH, ripe stalks bow low at harvest.

radicals.mnemonic: Rice grains scattered from a center.

mnemonicData.story: ME kernels scatter from a torn pantry sack.

radicals.mnemonic: Three thread strokes for silk-related words.

mnemonicData.story: SEE strand unspools across the loom in one pull.

radicals.mnemonic: Cowrie shell once used as currency.

mnemonicData.story: BAY traders carried cowrie currency through crowded markets.

radicals.mnemonic: An axle and wheels viewed from above.

mnemonicData.story: CHAIR axles rumble while wheels haul cargo downhill.

radicals.mnemonic: A horse with mane and tail simplified.

mnemonicData.story: MAMA reins snap as the fast mount crosses open ground.
